titles.title: FARMS Act
A bill to establish a Federal student loan restructured repayment schedule for certain borrowers who are agricultural producers.
FARMS Act
Flexible Agricultural Repayments and Modifying Schedules Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Flexible Agricultural Repayments and Modifying Schedules Act or FARMS Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to provide the option for a restructured student loan repayment schedule to certain agricultural producers, farmers, or ranchers.
